summary:
These weapon added by Dragonborn,their effects are unique.
But their designs are same,it\'s dull!
This mod makes them different,and contrastive!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=8][color=Crimson]BloodScythe[/color] and [color=Dodgerblue]SoulRender[/color] Reborn[/size][/font]

[font=Arial Black][size=6][color=Dodgerblue][b]-Description-[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[size=4][FONT=Lucida Sans Unicode]
These weapon added by Dragonborn,their effects are unique.
But their shape are same,it\'s dull!

This mod makes their designs different,and contrastive!
Anyway show images![/font][/size]

[size=4][color=Greenyellow]Required:Dragonborn[/color][/size]
author: metametroid
